sub_title: Technical Architect Director | Advisory and Professional Services at Salesforce - Driving Digital Transformation for our Customers
summary:
Employers: Salesforce; Microsoft, Oracle, SAP, Teradata and Canon Europe.
Experienced (30+ yrs) all-round architect (Cloud, Digital, Information, Business).
Specializations: Data Architecture, MDM, Digital Maturity Architecture, Business Transformation.

Worked in many different roles: research, software development, data warehouse architect, big data, enterprise architect, consultancy & advisory. I own PhD and MSc in Computer Science and Mathematics. More than 8 years of (C/C++/Unix) Software Development. Moved to sales engineering  (10 yrs) in the field of Analytics and Very Large Data Warehouses (Oracle, Microsoft, Teradata). Global Lead Architect and expert for Oracle (Siebel/nQuire) Analytics (2000-2010). Then went into consulting as Technical Director and setup an organisation of 35 people enabling them to staff projects with Oracle BI Applications and Oracle BI EE. Since 2011 I am working for Canon Europe as Principal Enterprise Architect responsible for the information architecture, including BI, MDM and setting up and enterprise information model including Big Data strategic direction. I am blessed with a combination of valuable experiences in the areas of information management, business intelligence, CRM and customer experience. I have developed a cloud-based Enterprise Solution Architecture for new B2C business strategies for Customer Experience Management, including front-office components Social Marketing and Engagement, Recommendation Engines, Service Management, e-Commerce, Digital Asset Management and Cloud Services including cloud storage solutions.

After so many years working in different lines of business (sales, consultancy, customer) I can say I bring home an all-round experience with a balanced skills in enterprise architecture, sales engineering , presentation/demo skills, commercial skills, business and industry knowledge, complex project implementation, communication skills to both C-level as deep technical. I have a strong drive to make people enthusiastic about technology and solutions meeting their compelling business needs and requirements.

treasury_media.title: New Salesforce Data Models on the Architect Digital Home
treasury_media.description: Salesforce is putting a lot of effort in standardising the core of our cloud applications: integrated data models as the fundament for the end-to-end customer journey, including core CRM applications, Sales, Service, Marketing and Commerce for B2B, B2C and D2C business models and for many different industries.

profile_positions.description: Advisory Enterprise Technical and Business Architect for large corporations on how to achieve the necessary Digital Transformation strategic objectives using the Salesforce Customer 360 Platform. I am specialising in B2B and B2B2C for the Manufacturing, Consumer Goods and AgTech sectors. These architectures include B2B components for Commerce, Marketing, Communities and field force effectiveness. Red line remains cloud information architecture including C360 Data Management (Global Profile Engine) and Audiences (customer data platform).
profile_positions.title: Director Program Architect

profile_positions.description: In the Microsoft Azure Cloud Team I work as a Data Solution Architect (DSA). In this role I advise our key accounts on how they can improve their business and customer experience by leveraging their data ecosystem. This includes big data architecture, information infrastructure and tooling based on the comprehensive and innovative Microsoft Azure Cloud platform. Fast innovation and  swiftly adapt to market and technology changes is key to stay ahead in business. How? A complete, fast and flexible cloud infrastructure and platform is the answer.
profile_positions.title: Data Solution Architect - Azure Cloud

profile_positions.description:
As a Teradata Sr Solution Architect I am responsible for the Architecture, Design, Implementation and Adoption of Enterprise Big Data, Data Warehouse, Customer Experience and Real-Time Analytics Solutions, based on Teradata products & services and partner offerings:

This responsibility includes:
- Enterprise Big Data Solutions
- Active Data Warehouse Platform
- Unified Data Architecture (UDA)
- Data Discovery integrated solutions (Aster)
- Teradata Analytics for SAP (TAS)
- Hadoop based Data Management and Integration
- Integrated Marketing and Campaign Management
- Understanding of Integrated and Complementary Partner Solutions

Specific Skills:
- Teradata 14 Database, Tools, Platform Architecture
- Teradata 14 SQL
- Teradata Unified Data Architecture
- Teradata Analytics for SAP
- SAP ECC, Hana, BW Architecture
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Solutions Architect at Teradata

profile_positions.description:
Overall responsible for the Solution Architecture of the Canon Unity program streams Data Warehouse, Business Intelligence and Digital Services.

Enterprise Architecture
•	Enterprise Information Architecture including Campaign-to-Cash, CXM, BI, MDM,
•	Business Process Modeling with ARIS Business Designer

BI/DWH responsibility includes:
•	Solution Reference Architecture
•	Big Data Strategy
•	Demand and Requirement gathering
•	Business Intelligence architecture
•	Data Warehouse Performance Tuning
•	COTS Data Warehouse Applications

•	Sales Force AutomationSFA/Salesforce.com
•	Understanding of End-to-end B2B, B2C, B2B2C business processes (FMCG)

CXM & Digital Services includes the following technologies:
•	Customer Experience Management (Salesforce.com/Oracle)
•	e-Commerce B2C and Enterprise Search (ATG)

profile_positions.title: Enterprise Information Architect (Big Data, CXM, BI, MDM)

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the development of large, enterprise data warehouse, business intelligence and master data management solutions together with a large team of in-depth experienced technical and business professionals. Business Analytics and Optimization emphasizes the effectiveness, optimization and competitive advantage of the business analytics solution in order to make the enterprise more intelligent. This solution is primarily, but not necessarily, based on IBM solution components, like MDM Server, ILog Business Rules Management, pre-built industry data models, Infosphere, Balanced Warehouse option, Cognos and SPSS and many more.
profile_positions.title: Associate Partner | Business Analytics & Optimization

profile_positions.description: As a Client Technical Professional for Enteprise Marketing Management at IBM I am designing solution architectures and supporting customers to improve and transform to an interactive marketing solution including campaign management, web analytics, e-commerce, business intelligence and data warehousing. Enterprise Marketing Management solutions comprise Unica Interactive Marketing Suite and CoreMetrics.
